FLARE Project

Fault Logging and Assessment for Responsive EV Repairs

The FLARE project aims to automate fault detection in EV charging stations using Semantic Segmentation and CNN-based Image Classification. By leveraging real-world data, we help identify charger malfunctions faster and improve maintenance response times.

Project Overview

ğŸ”¹ Problem: Broken EV chargers make charging unreliable for EV owners.
ğŸ”¹ Solution: AI-driven fault detection using image senmatic segmentation and binary classifier. ğŸ”¹ Goal: Increase charger reliability and accelerate EV adoption.

How It Works

1ï¸âƒ£ Users take a photo of a faulty EV charger.
2ï¸âƒ£ AI models classify the issue (e.g., damaged cord, broken screen).
3ï¸âƒ£ Reports are sent to service providers for faster maintenance.

ğŸš€ Our goal is to create a smarter, more reliable EV infrastructure!
